name: Living With The Moonoliths
description:
"Living With The Moonoliths" is a first person exploration game with focus on brutalism.

Explore the huge lunar landscape and find all secrets and mysteries kept in this area. The lifeless and abandoned envoirement is a wonderful meditative process to go through. It offers a fantastic other-worldly experience as you explore the innards of a jaw droppingly large and detailed megastructure.

Warning: This game has on purpose no saving system. The challenge is to find all secrets in one walkthrough.

______________________________________________________________

Recommended Requirements:

Windows:

OS: Windows 7 or later

Processor: 1.7GHz Dual Core (4th generation i5 or equivalent) or better

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: 512MB DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card (shader model 2) or better

DirectX: Version 9.0

Storage: 300 MB available space

______________________________________________________________
